thread.title: WCHS Class of 1975 gathers for 50th reunion at Briggs Woods
thread.title_full: WCHS Class of 1975 gathers for 50th reunion at Briggs Woods

title: WCHS Class of 1975 gathers for 50th reunion at Briggs Woods
text:
WCHS Class of 1975 gathers for 50th reunion at Briggs Woods
The Webster City High School Class of 1975 celebrated their 50th reunion Saturday, September 13, at the Briggs Woods Conference Center. There were 78 in attendance.
The events included a gathering on Friday night at the Wildcat Distillery, golf, a tour of Webster City, a social hour and dinner at Briggs Woods, and a brief program . A silent auction to raise money for a class gift was also held.
Emcees for the evening were Lois Martin Reiber and Randee Roberts. Ray (Sonny) Reasland, class president, read the names of those deceased and finished by singing the Lordâ€™s Prayer.
Those in the photo are as follows:
Back row left to right: Rodney Robb, Linda Schlotfeldt Nizzi, Ray Reasland, Randee Roberts, Scott Meline, Bill Greenley, Shelby Shehorn, Paul Swanson, Ken Cheyne, Ron Peterson and Tony Batcheller
4th row, left to right: Dale Wesselman, Paul Anderson, Pam Creek, Bryan Gilbert, Lois Martin Rieber, Josi Hopkins Greenley, Jone Staley Golly, Debbie Mickelson Hindrichs, Gail Raun Schorre, Kris Elliott Hallenburg, Sarah McMurray, Jerry Kloberdanz, Kevin McConnell, and Pam Keller Brockman,
3th row, left to right: Dale Wesselman, Christy Christensen, Nancy Buell Reasland, Marilyn Abbas, Segerstrom, Leann Trusty Schweitzer, Shirley Jones Christensen, Vicki Poland Totten, Dawn Meyers Trujillo, Meri Edge Ripley, Kim Welch Willson, and Wes Willson.
2nd row, on chairs: Jackie Burtnett Hanson, Deb Jansen Anderson, Tricia Doolittle Bird, MaryAnn Ryan, Julie Youngdale Hoag, Becky Lacey Mosley, Linda Olson Donner and Ginger Luick Colton.
Front row on floor: Kolleen Taylor, Joel Collinson, Calvin Britson, Tracy Olson, Christine Stephenson Brown, Dan Chadwick and Loran Seiser.
